text: There are nine billionaires in Netherlands as of 2019. This is according to a research done by Forbes. ==2019 Dutch billionaires list== Global ranking Name Citizenship Net worth (USD) Sources of wealth 89 Charlene de Carvalho-Heineken 14.7 billion Heineken 472 Frits Goldschmeding 4.2 billion Randstad Holding 916 Hans Melchers 2.5 billion chemicals, investments 1281 John de Mol Jr. 1.8 billion TV 1349 Kommer Damen 1.7 billion Damen Group 1605 Lesley Bamberger 1.4 billion Kroonenberg Groep 1605 Arnout Schuijff 1.4 billion Adyen 1717 Wim van der Leegte 1.3 billion VDL Groep 1941 Steven Schuurman 1.1 billion Elastic NV 1941 Pieter van der Does 1.1 billion Adyen 1947 Siebe De Steenwinkel 1.0 Billion Omroepvereniging VARA ==References== ==Other websites== *Forbes.com: Forbes World's Richest People - By country of citizenship *Forbes.com: Forbes World's Richest People - By country of residence \+ Category:Economy of the Netherlands
title: List of Dutch by net worth
